titles.title: There is a name I love to hear

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, O how I love Jesus, Because He first loved me!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It tells me what my Father hath In store for every day, And though I tread a darksome path, Yields sunshine all the way.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, the name I love so well, The name I love to hear! No saint on earth its worth can tell, No heart conceive how dear.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This name shall shed its fragrance still Along this thorny road, Shall sweetly smooth the rugged hill That leads me up to God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And there, with all the blood-bought throng, From sin and sorrow free, I’ll sing the new eternal song Of Jesus’ love to me.{/lang-eng}
